fulltext:
NGUYEN HUY CUONG 
35 LANG HA STREET, BA DINH DISTRICT, HA NOI 
(+84) 969032266 
ciminuv@gmail.com 
Summary 
●
Over 7 years experience in IT industry and working as a Lead Developer (at East Agile) for 
almost 3 years. 
●
Ability to lead a team and/or work independently and manage multiple tasks concurrently. 
●
Ability to learn and work on new technologies quickly. 
●
Great attention to detail. 
Skills 
●
Strong OO design, project architecture design,  and programming skills.  
●
Agile methodology skills: process, testing (TDD, BDD), tools, etc. 
●
Fluent programming languages: Objective-C, Swift. 
●
Familiar with programming languages: Ruby, C/C++, Bash shell script. 
●
Familiar with Unix (Mac OS, Solaris, or Linux command line). 
●
Data structures & algorithms. 
Experience 
2017 - PRESENT 
East Agile - BBM Messenger 
BBM is one of the largest mobile messaging applications. Moving beyond BlackBerry devices, the 
app now has over 100 million installs on Android, iOS, and Windows. 
EastAgile with a team of 40 engineers managed many teams focusing on each part of the application 
(there are more than 200 members in the development team) and I was the tech lead of Asset 
Sharing team focusing on reducing the error rate on file sharing, migrate file sharing infrastructure 
into the new one. I have worked closely with the teams distributed in Canada, Singapore and 
Indonesia to develop new features, improve performance and deal (refactor) with the legacy code 
base. 
2016 - 2017 
East Agile - CLI Studios 
2 
CLI Studios is an online dance program that provides online dance classes from top choreographers 
to dancers around the world. They also helps connect dancers and dance studios in USA. 
I worked directly with the Product Owner, in charge of developing new features for web application 
and maintaining legacy code base, then developing iOS version from scratch. 
2016 
East Agile - MealPass 
The application allows users to order and get lunch every weekday from a participating restaurant 
via smartphone. 
I worked closely with the Product Owner, built the whole app from back-end (API) to front-end (iOS) 
from scratch. 
2015 
East Agile - Philadelphia Media Network 
The website allows users to invest in athletes, help finance athletes’ expenses in exchange for equity 
in their season earnings. 
I started the web app from scratch, building pages to view athletes information and calculate equity 
with chart illustration. 
2014 
East Agile - Stack Lighting 
Stack Lighting is a smart bulb application, the company is building a truly smart light bulb - the Alba - 
in addition to being controllable via mobile apps, the bulb uses environmental factors and proximity 
detection to customize interior lighting automatically. 
EastAgile with a team of 10 engineers developed a hub controller and iOS & Android apps to control 
the Alba smart bulbs. I was in charge of developing an iOS client to communicate with the hub as 
well as focusing on bulb’s UI components controller. 
2014 
East Agile - Mingle 
Mingle is a dating site for singles and people who are interested in meeting singles.  
EastAgile with a team of 8 engineers built the whole app from back-end (API) to front-end (both 
Android and iOS) from scratch. I was in charge of developing new features as well as maintaining the 
iOS application. 
2012 - 2014 
NHN Viet Nam - Naver 
Naver is Korea base search engine company  wanted to create a search engine that understands 
Vietnamese language better than any other. 
3 
I implemented search application service layer which integrates with core search layer, caching 
layer, etc. Depending on each type of search service (news, content, dictionary, etc) we decided 
which algorithms to use for query processing, ranking to return the most relevant search results. 
Education 
May  2013 - August 2013 
NHN Korea - Search Engine Technology. 
March  2010 - April  2013 
FPT-APTECH - Information Technology.
